content: Back at the palace, Shirahoshi continues to cry, with Luffy trying to calm her down. The axe Decken had thrown earlier flies into the room, straight for the Princess. Luffy spots it in time and manages to knock it away, saving Shirahoshi. The guards and the Minister of the Right enter the room a moment later. Shirahoshi grabs Luffy and hides him behind her back, telling the guards that she just had a bad dream. They accept the explanation before telling the princess of the suspicions toward the Straw Hats due to the mermaid disappearances and Madame Shyarly's vision of Luffy destroying Fish-Man Island.
